title: New Yale study Vaccines linked to mental disorders in children
cleaned_text:
There is quite a bit of backlash in the comments section by one poster (cmgoodman) in particular. I don't think he knows who Dr. Leckman is, as he was suggesting we need to dismiss this and turn to our local pediatricians for necessary info.

This is valuable research that needs to continue rather than be squashed by any politics.

opengraph.title: New Yale study Vaccines linked to mental disorders in children
